pages.text: Copper jewelry is a set of basic trinkets that act as the base for more powerful $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/imbued_jewelry)Imbued Jewelry$(). Copper jewelry offers you a modest speed bonus, stacking with each piece worn. There are four pieces of base jewelry:$(li)$(#b0b)Copper Headband$()$(li)$(#b0b)Copper Amulet$()$(li)$(#b0b)Copper Ring$()$(li)$(#b0b)Copper Ward$()
